name: TOOTHY HISTORY
description:
TOOTHY HISTORY - is a 2D hardcore platformer with surviving elements where you have to do various levels and collecting things playing as a cute dinosaur.

As you have realized, you are a dinosaur that has to collect the whole items on the level.
There are five definite things picking up which you will be able to do the next level.
Be attentive because different traps and obstacles will be met on your way.
Don’t forget the dinosaur has only one life and if it touches the trap, it will die. Good luck!
